CMS
Fire Strike
Combat | EvocationArray
  • Duration: Immediate
    Range: 20 meters
    AOE: Target object or creature

  • You shoot an accurate bolt of flame at your target dealing 1d10 Heat damage. Creature may block or dodge damage dealt this way.
